title: LF Duo
body:
Looking for a duo to climb to Diamond with (hopefully), preferably an adc main, but I don't really mind. I'm a support main, in Platinum II atm (season 5: Silver III, season 6: Gold V, placed in Silver III this season), I would prefer if you're around the same rank as me, and not toxic. I have Discord for communication, but am somewhat quiet though. I'm aware that I have things to improve on, and am working on my skills still.
Either reply to this post, or add me in game please, I'm typically online most days.
Summoner name: Tsaint

Thank you ^^
